title: What Makes Me Different
description: I’m young, hungry, and obsessed with shipping quality code fast. Here’s what you get with me:

items.title: Ridiculously Fast Delivery
items.description: Your backend gets done before you even expect it. Missed deadlines? Never heard of them.

items.title: Code That Scales
items.description: I don’t hack stuff together. Everything’s clean, modular, and future-proof.

items.title: Zero-Risk Guarantee
items.description: If I don’t deliver what I promised, you don’t pay. No drama.

items.title: Straightforward Communication
items.description: You’ll always know what’s going on. No ghosting, no jargon, no BS.
